data.title: GCStar Beta 1.5.0
data.meta_description: GCStar Beta, free download. GCStar Beta 1.5.0: GCStar Beta is a software tool that was designed and created by Christian Stein in the years 2002-2005.
data.text:
GCStar Beta is a software tool that was designed and created by Christian Stein in the years 2002-2005. It's built to organize, manage and keep track of various collections one may have. With this software, the user is able to input and store data regarding their collections, be it books, movies, music, coins or any other item that one may collect.

The interface of GCStar Beta is user-friendly with options in the form of buttons and menus. The user can enter details about each item in their collection - such as author, title, publisher or release date - and store relevant images as well. The software can be used to search for specific items in the collection using filters like title, author or even release year.

Furthermore, GCStar Beta allows the user to export their entire collection in different formats for backup purposes or to share the data with others. The software is still in beta phase, which means it's still under development and may receive updates in the future.

GCStar Beta is an excellent software tool for anyone who wants to manage their collection more efficiently. It's easy to use and flexible enough to accommodate most types of collections you may have.

Overview

GCStar Beta is a Shareware software in the category Business developed by (c) 2002-05 by Christian Stein.

The latest version of GCStar Beta is 1.5.0, released on 08/06/2009. It was initially added to our database on 10/29/2007.

GCStar Beta runs on the following operating systems: Windows.

Users of GCStar Beta gave it a rating of 5 out of 5 stars.
